text:
dEBuH || 
tvayA# vaqya(gm) sa#dhaqnya#-stvOtAq-stavaq praNI$tya SyAmaq vAjAn# | 
uqBA Sa(gm)sA# sUdaya satyatAtE-&nuShThuqyA kRu#Nuhya-hrayANa ||
aqyA tE# agnE saqmidhA# vidhEmaq pratiqstOma(gm)# SaqsyamA#naM gRuBAya | 
dahAqSasO# raqkShasa#H pAqhya#smAn druqhO niqdO mi#tramahO avaqdyAt || 
raqkShOqhaNaM# ~MvAqjinaqmAji# Garmi miqtraM prathi#ShThaq-mupa#yAmiq Sarma# | 
SiSA#nO aqgniH kratu#BiqH-sami#ddhaqH-sanOq divAq - [  ] 33
